meanings.definition: One who takes part in something.
meanings.sent1: The partaker of the cake enjoyed every bite.
meanings.sent2: The partaker of the game cheered loudly for their team.
meanings.sent3: The partaker of the dance floor showed off some impressive moves.
meanings.sent4: As a partaker of stories, she immersed herself in every tale.
meanings.sent5: The partaker of the adventure savored each moment of the journey.

meanings.sent1: She will partaker in the upcoming marathon.
meanings.sent2: He partakered in the discussion with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The kids partakered in the fun activities at the park.
meanings.sent4: They decided to partaker in the charity event to help others.
meanings.sent5: The team eagerly partakered in the competition to showcase their skills.
